00029  * lustre/mdt/mdt_hsm_cdt_client.c

00031  * Lustre HSM Coordinator

00051 struct hsm_compat_data_cb {
00052         struct coordinator      *cdt;
00053         struct hsm_action_list  *hal;
00054 };
00055 
00066 static int hsm_find_compatible_cb(const struct lu_env *env,
00067                                   struct llog_handle *llh,
00068                                   struct llog_rec_hdr *hdr, void *data)
00069 {
00070         struct llog_agent_req_rec       *larr;
00071         struct hsm_compat_data_cb       *hcdcb;
00072         struct hsm_action_item          *hai;
00073         int                              i;
00074         ENTRY;
00075 
00076         larr = (struct llog_agent_req_rec *)hdr;
00077         hcdcb = data;
00078         /* a compatible request must be WAITING or STARTED
00079          * and not a cancel */
00080         if ((larr->arr_status != ARS_WAITING &&
00081              larr->arr_status != ARS_STARTED) ||
00082             larr->arr_hai.hai_action == HSMA_CANCEL)
00083                 RETURN(0);
00084 
00085         hai = hai_first(hcdcb->hal);
00086         for (i = 0; i < hcdcb->hal->hal_count; i++, hai = hai_next(hai)) {
00087                 /* if request is a CANCEL:
00088                  * if cookie set in the request, there is no need to find a
00089                  * compatible one, the cookie in the request is directly used.
00090                  * if cookie is not set, we use the FID to find the request
00091                  * to cancel (the "compatible" one)
00092                  * if the caller sets the cookie, we assume he also sets the
00093                  * arr_archive_id
00094                  */
00095                 if (hai->hai_action == HSMA_CANCEL && hai->hai_cookie != 0)
00096                         continue;
00097 
00098                 if (!lu_fid_eq(&hai->hai_fid, &larr->arr_hai.hai_fid))
00099                         continue;
00100 
00101                 /* HSMA_NONE is used to find running request for some FID */
00102                 if (hai->hai_action == HSMA_NONE) {
00103                         hcdcb->hal->hal_archive_id = larr->arr_archive_id;
00104                         hcdcb->hal->hal_flags = larr->arr_flags;
00105                         *hai = larr->arr_hai;
00106                         continue;
00107                 }
00108                 /* in V1 we do not manage partial transfer
00109                  * so extent is always whole file
00110                  */
00111                 hai->hai_cookie = larr->arr_hai.hai_cookie;
00112                 /* we read the archive number from the request we cancel */
00113                 if (hai->hai_action == HSMA_CANCEL &&
00114                     hcdcb->hal->hal_archive_id == 0)
00115                         hcdcb->hal->hal_archive_id = larr->arr_archive_id;
00116         }
00117         RETURN(0);
00118 }
00119 
00130 static int hsm_find_compatible(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdt_device *mdt,
00131                                struct hsm_action_list *hal)
00132 {
00133         struct hsm_action_item          *hai;
00134         struct hsm_compat_data_cb        hcdcb;
00135         int                              rc, i, ok_cnt;
00136         ENTRY;
00137 
00138         ok_cnt = 0;
00139         hai = hai_first(hal);
00140         for (i = 0; i < hal->hal_count; i++, hai = hai_next(hai)) {
00141                 /* in a cancel request hai_cookie may be set by caller to
00142                  * show the request to be canceled
00143                  * if not we need to search by FID
00144                  */
00145                 if (hai->hai_action == HSMA_CANCEL && hai->hai_cookie != 0)
00146                         ok_cnt++;
00147                 else
00148                         hai->hai_cookie = 0;
00149         }
00150 
00151         /* if all requests are cancel with cookie, no need to find compatible */
00152         if (ok_cnt == hal->hal_count)
00153                 RETURN(0);
00154 
00155         hcdcb.cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00156         hcdcb.hal = hal;
00157 
00158         rc = cdt_llog_process(env, mdt, hsm_find_compatible_cb, &hcdcb);
00159 
00160         RETURN(rc);
00161 }
00162 
00171 static bool hsm_action_is_needed(struct hsm_action_item *hai, int hal_an,
00172                                  __u64 rq_flags, struct md_hsm *hsm)
00173 {
00174         bool     is_needed = false;
00175         int      hsm_flags;
00176         ENTRY;
00177 
00178         if (rq_flags & HSM_FORCE_ACTION)
00179                 RETURN(true);
00180 
00181         hsm_flags = hsm->mh_flags;
00182         switch (hai->hai_action) {
00183         case HSMA_ARCHIVE:
00184                 if (hsm_flags & HS_DIRTY || !(hsm_flags & HS_ARCHIVED))
00185                         is_needed = true;
00186                 break;
00187         case HSMA_RESTORE:
00188                 /* if file is dirty we must return an error, this function
00189                  * cannot, so we ask for an action and
00190                  * mdt_hsm_is_action_compat() will return an error
00191                  */
00192                 if (hsm_flags & (HS_RELEASED | HS_DIRTY))
00193                         is_needed = true;
00194                 break;
00195         case HSMA_REMOVE:
00196                 if (hsm_flags & (HS_ARCHIVED | HS_EXISTS))
00197                         is_needed = true;
00198                 break;
00199         case HSMA_CANCEL:
00200                 is_needed = true;
00201                 break;
00202         }
00203         CDEBUG(D_HSM, "fid="DFID" action=%s rq_flags="LPX64
00204                       " extent="LPX64"-"LPX64" hsm_flags=%X %s\n",
00205                       PFID(&hai->hai_fid),
00206                       hsm_copytool_action2name(hai->hai_action), rq_flags,
00207                       hai->hai_extent.offset, hai->hai_extent.length,
00208                       hsm->mh_flags,
00209                       (is_needed ? "action needed" : "no action needed"));
00210 
00211         RETURN(is_needed);
00212 }
00213 
00221 static bool hal_is_sane(struct hsm_action_list *hal)
00222 {
00223         int                      i;
00224         struct hsm_action_item  *hai;
00225         ENTRY;
00226 
00227         if (hal->hal_count == 0)
00228                 RETURN(false);
00229 
00230         hai = hai_first(hal);
00231         for (i = 0; i < hal->hal_count; i++, hai = hai_next(hai)) {
00232                 if (!fid_is_sane(&hai->hai_fid))
00233                         RETURN(false);
00234                 switch (hai->hai_action) {
00235                 case HSMA_NONE:
00236                 case HSMA_ARCHIVE:
00237                 case HSMA_RESTORE:
00238                 case HSMA_REMOVE:
00239                 case HSMA_CANCEL:
00240                         break;
00241                 default:
00242                         RETURN(false);
00243                 }
00244         }
00245         RETURN(true);
00246 }
00247 
00248 static int
00249 hsm_action_permission(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
00250                       struct mdt_object *obj,
00251                       enum hsm_copytool_action hsma)
00252 {
00253         struct coordinator *cdt = &mti->mti_mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00254         struct lu_ucred *uc = mdt_ucred(mti);
00255         struct md_attr *ma = &mti->mti_attr;
00256         const __u64 *mask;
00257         int rc;
00258         ENTRY;
00259 
00260         if (hsma != HSMA_RESTORE &&
00261             exp_connect_flags(mti->mti_exp) & OBD_CONNECT_RDONLY)
00262                 RETURN(-EROFS);
00263 
00264         if (md_capable(uc, CFS_CAP_SYS_ADMIN))
00265                 RETURN(0);
00266 
00267         ma->ma_need = MA_INODE;
00268         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(mti, obj, ma);
00269         if (rc < 0)
00270                 RETURN(rc);
00271 
00272         if (uc->uc_fsuid == ma->ma_attr.la_uid)
00273                 mask = &cdt->cdt_user_request_mask;
00274         else if (lustre_in_group_p(uc, ma->ma_attr.la_gid))
00275                 mask = &cdt->cdt_group_request_mask;
00276         else
00277                 mask = &cdt->cdt_other_request_mask;
00278 
00279         if (!(0 <= hsma && hsma < 8 * sizeof(*mask)))
00280                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00281 
00282         RETURN(*mask & (1UL << hsma) ? 0 : -EPERM);
00283 }
00284 
00285 /*
00286  * Coordinator external API
00287  */
00288 
00298 int mdt_hsm_add_actions(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
00299                         struct hsm_action_list *hal, __u64 *compound_id)
00300 {
00301         struct mdt_device       *mdt = mti->mti_mdt;
00302         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00303         struct hsm_action_item  *hai;
00304         struct mdt_object       *obj = NULL;
00305         int                      rc = 0, i;
00306         struct md_hsm            mh;
00307         bool                     is_restore = false;
00308         ENTRY;
00309 
00310         /* no coordinator started, so we cannot serve requests */
00311         if (cdt->cdt_state == CDT_STOPPED)
00312                 RETURN(-EAGAIN);
00313 
00314         if (!hal_is_sane(hal))
00315                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00316 
00317         *compound_id = atomic_inc_return(&cdt->cdt_compound_id);
00318 
00319         /* search for compatible request, if found hai_cookie is set
00320          * to the request cookie
00321          * it is also used to set the cookie for cancel request by FID
00322          */
00323         rc = hsm_find_compatible(mti->mti_env, mdt, hal);
00324         if (rc)
00325                 GOTO(out, rc);
00326 
00327         hai = hai_first(hal);
00328         for (i = 0; i < hal->hal_count; i++, hai = hai_next(hai)) {
00329                 int archive_id;
00330                 __u64 flags;
00331 
00332                 /* default archive number is the one explicitly specified */
00333                 archive_id = hal->hal_archive_id;
00334                 flags = hal->hal_flags;
00335 
00336                 /* by default, data FID is same as Lustre FID */
00337                 /* the volatile data FID will be created by copy tool and
00338                  * send from the agent through the progress call */
00339                 hai->hai_dfid = hai->hai_fid;
00340 
00341                 /* done here to manage first and redundant requests cases */
00342                 if (hai->hai_action == HSMA_RESTORE)
00343                         is_restore = true;
00344 
00345                 /* test result of hsm_find_compatible()
00346                  * if request redundant or cancel of nothing
00347                  * do not record
00348                  */
00349                 /* redundant case */
00350                 if (hai->hai_action != HSMA_CANCEL && hai->hai_cookie != 0)
00351                         continue;
00352                 /* cancel nothing case */
00353                 if (hai->hai_action == HSMA_CANCEL && hai->hai_cookie == 0)
00354                         continue;
00355 
00356                 /* new request or cancel request
00357                  * we search for HSM status flags to check for compatibility
00358                  * if restore, we take the layout lock
00359                  */
00360 
00361                 /* Get HSM attributes and check permissions. */
00362                 obj = mdt_hsm_get_md_hsm(mti, &hai->hai_fid, &mh);
00363                 if (IS_ERR(obj)) {
00364                         /* In case of REMOVE and CANCEL a Lustre file
00365                          * is not mandatory, but restrict this
00366                          * exception to admins. */
00367                         if (md_capable(mdt_ucred(mti), CFS_CAP_SYS_ADMIN) &&
00368                             (hai->hai_action == HSMA_REMOVE ||
00369                              hai->hai_action == HSMA_CANCEL))
00370                                 goto record;
00371                         else
00372                                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(obj));
00373                 }
00374 
00375                 rc = hsm_action_permission(mti, obj, hai->hai_action);
00376                 mdt_object_put(mti->mti_env, obj);
00377 
00378                 if (rc < 0)
00379                         GOTO(out, rc);
00380 
00381                 /* if action is cancel, also no need to check */
00382                 if (hai->hai_action == HSMA_CANCEL)
00383                         goto record;
00384 
00385                 /* Check if an action is needed, compare request
00386                  * and HSM flags status */
00387                 if (!hsm_action_is_needed(hai, archive_id, flags, &mh))
00388                         continue;
00389 
00390                 /* Check if file request is compatible with HSM flags status
00391                  * and stop at first incompatible
00392                  */
00393                 if (!mdt_hsm_is_action_compat(hai, archive_id, flags, &mh))
00394                         GOTO(out, rc = -EPERM);
00395 
00396                 /* for cancel archive number is taken from canceled request
00397                  * for other request, we take from lma if not specified,
00398                  * or we use the default if none found in lma
00399                  * this works also for archive because the default value is 0
00400                  * /!\ there is a side effect: in case of restore on multiple
00401                  * files which are in different backend, the initial compound
00402                  * request will be split in multiple requests because we cannot
00403                  * warranty an agent can serve any combinaison of archive
00404                  * backend
00405                  */
00406                 if (hai->hai_action != HSMA_CANCEL && archive_id == 0) {
00407                         if (mh.mh_arch_id != 0)
00408                                 archive_id = mh.mh_arch_id;
00409                         else
00410                                 archive_id = cdt->cdt_default_archive_id;
00411                 }
00412 
00413                 /* if restore, take an exclusive lock on layout */
00414                 if (hai->hai_action == HSMA_RESTORE) {
00415                         struct cdt_restore_handle *crh;
00416 
00417                         /* in V1 only whole file is supported. */
00418                         if (hai->hai_extent.offset != 0)
00419                                 GOTO(out, rc = -EPROTO);
00420 
00421                         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR(crh, mdt_hsm_cdt_kmem);
00422                         if (crh == NULL)
00423                                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00424 
00425                         crh->crh_fid = hai->hai_fid;
00426                         /* in V1 only whole file is supported. However the
00427                          * restore may be due to truncate. */
00428                         crh->crh_extent.start = 0;
00429                         crh->crh_extent.end = hai->hai_extent.length;
00430 
00431                         mdt_lock_reg_init(&crh->crh_lh, LCK_EX);
00432                         obj = mdt_object_find_lock(mti, &crh->crh_fid,
00433                                                    &crh->crh_lh,
00434                                                    MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT);
00435                         if (IS_ERR(obj)) {
00436                                 rc = PTR_ERR(obj);
00437                                 CERROR("%s: cannot take layout lock for "
00438                                        DFID": rc = %d\n", mdt_obd_name(mdt),
00439                                        PFID(&crh->crh_fid), rc);
00440                                 OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(crh, mdt_hsm_cdt_kmem);
00441                                 GOTO(out, rc);
00442                         }
00443 
00444                         /* we choose to not keep a keep a reference
00445                          * on the object during the restore time which can be
00446                          * very long */
00447                         mdt_object_put(mti->mti_env, obj);
00448 
00449                         mutex_lock(&cdt->cdt_restore_lock);
00450                         list_add_tail(&crh->crh_list, &cdt->cdt_restore_hdl);
00451                         mutex_unlock(&cdt->cdt_restore_lock);
00452                 }
00453 record:
00454                 /* record request */
00455                 rc = mdt_agent_record_add(mti->mti_env, mdt, *compound_id,
00456                                           archive_id, flags, hai);
00457                 if (rc)
00458                         GOTO(out, rc);
00459         }
00460         if (is_restore &&
00461             (cdt->cdt_policy & CDT_NONBLOCKING_RESTORE))
00462                 rc = -ENODATA;
00463         else
00464                 rc = 0;
00465 
00466         GOTO(out, rc);
00467 out:
00468         /* if work has been added, wake up coordinator */
00469         if (rc == 0 || rc == -ENODATA)
00470                 mdt_hsm_cdt_wakeup(mdt);
00471 
00472         return rc;
00473 }
00474 
00482 int mdt_hsm_get_running(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
00483                         struct hsm_action_list *hal)
00484 {
00485         struct mdt_device       *mdt = mti->mti_mdt;
00486         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00487         struct hsm_action_item  *hai;
00488         int                      i;
00489         ENTRY;
00490 
00491         hai = hai_first(hal);
00492         for (i = 0; i < hal->hal_count; i++, hai = hai_next(hai)) {
00493                 struct cdt_agent_req *car;
00494 
00495                 if (!fid_is_sane(&hai->hai_fid))
00496                         RETURN(-EINVAL);
00497 
00498                 car = mdt_cdt_find_request(cdt, 0, &hai->hai_fid);
00499                 if (car == NULL) {
00500                         hai->hai_cookie = 0;
00501                         hai->hai_action = HSMA_NONE;
00502                 } else {
00503                         *hai = *car->car_hai;
00504                         mdt_cdt_put_request(car);
00505                 }
00506         }
00507         RETURN(0);
00508 }
00509 
00519 bool mdt_hsm_restore_is_running(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
00520                                 const struct lu_fid *fid)
00521 {
00522         struct mdt_device               *mdt = mti->mti_mdt;
00523         struct coordinator              *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00524         struct cdt_restore_handle       *crh;
00525         bool                             rc = false;
00526         ENTRY;
00527 
00528         if (!fid_is_sane(fid))
00529                 RETURN(rc);
00530 
00531         mutex_lock(&cdt->cdt_restore_lock);
00532         list_for_each_entry(crh, &cdt->cdt_restore_hdl, crh_list) {
00533                 if (lu_fid_eq(&crh->crh_fid, fid)) {
00534                         rc = true;
00535                         break;
00536                 }
00537         }
00538         mutex_unlock(&cdt->cdt_restore_lock);
00539         RETURN(rc);
00540 }
00541 
00549 int mdt_hsm_get_actions(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
00550                         struct hsm_action_list *hal)
00551 {
00552         struct mdt_device       *mdt = mti->mti_mdt;
00553         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00554         struct hsm_action_item  *hai;
00555         int                      i, rc;
00556         ENTRY;
00557 
00558         hai = hai_first(hal);
00559         for (i = 0; i < hal->hal_count; i++, hai = hai_next(hai)) {
00560                 hai->hai_action = HSMA_NONE;
00561                 if (!fid_is_sane(&hai->hai_fid))
00562                         RETURN(-EINVAL);
00563         }
00564 
00565         /* 1st we search in recorded requests */
00566         rc = hsm_find_compatible(mti->mti_env, mdt, hal);
00567         /* if llog file is not created, no action is recorded */
00568         if (rc == -ENOENT)
00569                 RETURN(0);
00570 
00571         if (rc)
00572                 RETURN(rc);
00573 
00574         /* 2nd we search if the request are running
00575          * cookie is cleared to tell to caller, the request is
00576          * waiting
00577          * we could in place use the record status, but in the future
00578          * we may want do give back dynamic informations on the
00579          * running request
00580          */
00581         hai = hai_first(hal);
00582         for (i = 0; i < hal->hal_count; i++, hai = hai_next(hai)) {
00583                 struct cdt_agent_req *car;
00584 
00585                 car = mdt_cdt_find_request(cdt, hai->hai_cookie, NULL);
00586                 if (car == NULL) {
00587                         hai->hai_cookie = 0;
00588                 } else {
00589                         __u64 data_moved;
00590 
00591                         mdt_cdt_get_work_done(car, &data_moved);
00592                         /* this is just to give the volume of data moved
00593                          * it means data_moved data have been moved from the
00594                          * original request but we do not know which one
00595                          */
00596                         hai->hai_extent.length = data_moved;
00597                         mdt_cdt_put_request(car);
00598                 }
00599         }
00600 
00601         RETURN(0);
00602 }
